DataElement.preferredName: Intravenous Contrast Agent Bolus Infusion Administered Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identification of the class of contrast imaging agent administered intravenously.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intravenous Contrast Agent Bolus Infusion Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (in-tra-VEE-nus) IV. Within a blood vessel._Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue._A single dose of drug usually injected into a blood vessel over a short period of time._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (in-tra-VEE-nus) IV. Within a blood vessel.:Substances used in radiography that allow visualization of certain tissues.

Concepts.definition: Into or within a vein. Intravenous usually refers to a way of giving a drug or other substance through a needle or tube inserted into a vein.

Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue.

Property.preferredDefinition: A single dose of drug usually injected into a blood vessel over a short period of time.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A procedure in which a single dose of a pharmalogical substance is administered, generally via injection, over a short period of time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or characterized by two phases or stages.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or characterized by only one phase or stage.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or characterized by three phases or stages.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
